attributes.action: appoint Philip Richard Sheard to the position for Minister for Recycling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Philip Sheard is a Newcastle University student, who has devoted his time to encouraging fellow peers to recycle. His enthusiasm for recycling in unchallenged in these circles, and his passion for 'going green' and helping the environment is second to none. Therefore, I propose Philip Sheard for the new position of Minister for Recycling, as part of a new initiative to combat environmental issues.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
